trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Wales
There was one other sighting in Lake Wales on or around February 4th 2002
divs: sighting detailsthe witness was watching tv (shades in the room are kept open) when sheglanced over to the lake behind her house. when she glanced at the water, shesaw a refection in the water that caught her eye. she turned around andwitnessed two lights just hanging in the sky in the east\south east. the lightswere a yellow\orange in color and circular.the two she initially saw suddenly disappeared after five minutes. then shewitnessed two more suddenly appear and again disappear. then there was aconfiguration of four light two to the right and two to the left groupedtogether. after they disappeared, then three lights appeared, but they werestacked vertically. as she has seen this before, she tired and went back towatching tv. they called their neighbors to let them know that the lights wereback again. they didnt know that their neighbors took pictures of the lights.they verified the picture of the sighting as being what they witnessed.
Summary: Unidentified Suspicious Lights, Polk Cty. FL
